Package com.example.carrent.admin

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.example.carrent.admin.AdminController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="api/admin") public class AdminController extends Object
Rest controller for managing admin-related operations.

      Retrieves a list of all admins.

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addNewAdmin(@RequestBody Admin admin)
      Adds a new admin.
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin to add
      Returns:
      the response entity with the created admin

    • getAdminById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAdminById(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      Retrieves an admin by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the admin to retrieve
      Returns:
      the response entity with the found admin or a 404 status if not found

    • updateAdmin

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateAdmin(@PathVariable("id") int id, @RequestBody Admin updatedAdmin)
      Updates an existing admin.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the admin to update
      updatedAdmin - the updated admin data
      Returns:
      the response entity with the updated admin

    • getAdminsByAttribute

      @GetMapping("/searchAdmin/{data}") public ArrayList<Admin> getAdminsByAttribute(@PathVariable("data") String data)
      Searches for admins by a specific attribute.
      Parameters:
      data - the attribute to search by
      Returns:
      a list of admins matching the attribute

    • setNewRole

      @PostMapping("/setNewRole/{id}") public void setNewRole(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      Sets a new role for an employee by transferring them to VehicleCarGiver.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the employee to transfer
